changeSet.author: rkuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS advisors ( id BIGSERIAL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role TEXT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT advisors_PK PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT advisors_email_AK UNIQUE (email), CONSTRAINT advisors_username_AK UNIQUE (username), CONSTRAINT advisors_role_check CHECK (role IN ('ASSOCIATE', 'PARTNER', 'SENIOR')) );

changeSet.author: rkuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS applicants ( id BIGSERIAL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ssn VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, street VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, zip INT NOT NULL, apt VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT applicants_PK PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT users_email_AK UNIQUE (email), CONSTRAINT users_username_AK UNIQUE (username), CONSTRAINT applicants_ssn_AK UNIQUE (ssn) );

changeSet.author: rkuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS phone_numbers ( number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, type TEXT NOT NULL, applicant_id INT, CONSTRAINT phone_numbers_type_check CHECK (type IN ('HOME', 'WORK', 'MOBILE')), CONSTRAINT phone_numbers_applicants_FK FOREIGN KEY (applicant_id) REFERENCES applicants (id) );

changeSet.author: rkuznetsov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS applications ( id BIGSERIAL, amount MONEY NOT NULL, status TEXT NOT NULL DEFAULT 'NEW', created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), assigned_at TIMESTAMP, applicant_id INT NOT NULL, advisor_id INT, CONSTRAINT applications_PK PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT applications_status_check CHECK (status IN ('NEW', 'ASSIGNED', 'ON_HOLD', 'APPROVED', 'CANCELED', 'DECLINED')), CONSTRAINT applications_applicants_FK FOREIGN KEY (applicant_id) REFERENCES applicants (id), CONSTRAINT applications_advisors_FK FOREIGN KEY (advisor_id) REFERENCES advisors (id) );
